main.name: Tyson Wright
main.description: Experienced in Data Analytics, Web Development, Software Engineering, Systems Architecture and Sytems Administration.

about.aboutLine: Utilizing data, programming and technological skills to uncover insights and solve complex problems.

education.description: A program that covers statistical analysis, data visualization, machine learning, and data management to provide students with the skills and knowledge to collect, analyze, and interpret data to make informed decisions.

Completed a three-year Bachelor of Information Technology degree with credit distinction, which provided me with the knowledge and skills to design, develop, and manage IT systems. The program covered a range of topics, including programming, data management, networking, and security, and gave me the ability to apply these skills to solve real-world problems. As a graduate, I am well-prepared for a wide range of careers in the IT industry, including roles in software development, network administration, and IT project management.

work.title: Systems Administrator & Software Developer
description: Successfully led the implementation and migration of various on-premise systems, including email, file shares and databases to cloud-native platforms. This resulted in cost optimization, enhanced reliability, increased uptime, and improved security posture.
Managed and maintained high-availability of business systems and applications through effective time-management and problem-solving.
Improved network security and performance through the implementation of best practices and the deployment of new devices & technologies, such as Palo Alto firewalls and IPSec VPN's.
Collaborated with stakeholders to identify and fix issues with a legacy Pascal business application, implementing updates and improvements to enhance its functionality and user experience.

Developed and deployed custom business applications to support critical warehouse operations, including order fulfillment, inventory management, and stock control, resulting in enhanced productivity and operational efficiency.

work.title: Team Member
description: Torquay Warehouse Team Member of the Year 2019.
Provided excellent customer service promptly and courteously to help customers using creative problem solving to ensure customers got the information they needed.

work.title: Front-End Web Development Intern
description: Responsible for implementing responsive layouts for mobile and tablet devices to the codelearn.io webapp.
Technologies used: C#, .NET, JavaScript, Git, Bootstrap, Chart.js, CSS & HTML.

work.title: Website Development & Maintenance, Volunteer
description: Developed a WooCommerce website for Jan Juc Cricket Club
Provided ongoing maintenance and support for the website, including updates, backups, and troubleshooting
Contributed to the success of the club by creating a reliable and effective online presence for merchandise and membership sales
Technologies used: WordPress, WooCommerce, PayPal API

projects.title: Plant Catalogue
projects.description: Uses the trefle.io API to display and search through plants by common name, scientific name, genus and family. Shows helpful information about varying growing conditions for each plant. PWA optimized with efficient caching policy and installable from the browser. Archived since the trefle.io API has been deprecated.

projects.title: AWS Cloud Services
projects.description: Designed and implemented a cloud-based C# application that communicated with multiple WCF services hosted on AWS. Utilized 9 EC2 instances to run 3 differnet algorithms and a load balancer to distribute calculations evenly across VMs, resulting in improved performance and scalability. Demonstrated strong skills in cloud computing, C# development, and WCF service integration through the successful completion of this project.

projects.title: Jan Juc Cricket Club Store
projects.description: Implemented a simple, easy-to-use e-commerce solution using WordPress and WooCommerce for the Jan Juc Cricket club. The site is used to collect membership payments and sell club merchandise. Handles over $5,000 in sales annually.
projects.technology: WordPress, WooCommerce, PayPal and various plug-ins

projects.title: Time is Money - Chrome Extension
projects.description: A chrome extension that converts monetary amounts displayed on websites into the equivalent hours you'd need to work based on your hourly pay rate.

projects.title: Capstone Application Portal
projects.description: For my university capstone project I was the Back-End leader for the Capstone Application Portal project. We were tasked by the client to make a number of visual and functional changes to an existing job-board website that did not meet the business requirements.
